column4: hello, the upgrade to lucid tells me I don't have enough space on /var ... is there a way to get apt to use another filesystem for the upgrade?
Jim I already did a clean... I have a 2G partition, 600M used, and the upgrade wants 1.5 roughly...
mount a different partition in /var/cache/apt/archives/ ? ( or make a link ? )
if it is only for upgrading just make that with /var/cache/apt/archives/
